actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to adjust the time for payment of manufacturers excise tax on tires, tubes and tread rubber.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to declare that the manufacturers excise tax on tires, tubes, and tread rubber shall be due and payable 90 days after the last day of the month in which the manufacturer, producer, or importer of articles subject to such tax sells them.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to adjust the time for payment of manufacturers excise tax on tires, tubes and tread rubber.
